Nightlight::

Nightlight look worried Aerotaur, and said "What do you think is 
going on with your circuits that you can't transform to robot mode? 
May I help you???"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Aerotaur::
>     "Yeah I'm having trouble with that myself.  Hmm, I wonder if my 
twitch is 
> gone yet."  He tries to transform to robot mode.  The 
transformation fails.  
> Again.  "Argh!  I thought I'd gotten past that."
